special_text:
Koios, Spear of Karda enters with a number of additional loyalty counters on him equal to your devotion to red. [i](He doesn’t count himself.)[/i]
[+1]: Exile the top three cards of your library. You may cast one of them.
[-3]: Koios deals damage to any nonplayer target equal to your devotion to red.
[-X]: Choose up to X target creatures with total mana value X or less. For each creature chosen this way, create a token that’s a copy of it, except it has haste. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
